content:
The scrambled eggs with spinach and feta are a delicious and nutritious breakfast option. Here's a 7-day meal plan that prioritizes self-care and includes healthy dinner options:

**Monday**

* Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and feta (10 minutes)
* Self-care: 10-minute morning meditation session
* Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, and sweet potatoes) and quinoa (30 minutes)

**Tuesday**

* Breakfast: Greek yogurt with mixed berries and granola (5 minutes)
* Self-care: 30-minute walk outside during lunch break
* Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted asparagus and brown rice (25 minutes)

**Wednesday**

* Breakfast: Avocado toast with poached eggs (12 minutes)
* Self-care: 10-minute journaling session before bed
* Dinner: Lentil soup with whole-grain bread and a side salad (30 minutes)

**Thursday**

* Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with banana, spinach, and almond milk topped with nuts and seeds (10 minutes)
* Self-care: 10-minute stretching session in the morning
* Dinner: Grilled turkey burger on a whole-grain bun with roasted bell peppers and sweet potato fries (30 minutes)

**Friday**

* Breakfast: Overnight oats with banana and almond milk (prep time: 5 minutes, cook time: 0 minutes)
* Self-care: 30-minute yoga session in the evening
* Dinner: Slow-cooker chicken and vegetable stew with quinoa (30 minutes)

**Saturday**

* Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with whole-grain toast and mixed berries (10 minutes)
* Self-care: 1-hour outdoor hike or nature walk
* Dinner: Grilled shrimp with roasted Brussels sprouts and brown rice (25 minutes)

**Sunday**

* Breakfast: Avocado toast with scrambled eggs and cherry tomatoes (12 minutes)
* Self-care: 30-minute reading session in the morning
* Dinner: Baked chicken breast with roasted carrots and quinoa (25 minutes)

**Additional Self-Care Tips**

* Drink at least 8 glasses of water per day
* Aim for 7-8 hours of sleep each night
* Take 10-minute breaks every hour to stretch and move your body
* Practice gratitude by writing down three things you're thankful for each day
* Schedule time for activities that bring you joy and relaxation, such as reading, listening to music, or taking a relaxing bath

Remember, self-care is not a one-size-fits-all approach. Feel free to adjust this meal plan and self-care schedule to suit your individual needs and preferences. Prioritize activities that nourish your body, mind, and soul, and don't hesitate to reach out for support when you need it.
